name: Longline VMS data miner
short_description: Four Oracle PL/SQL software packages designed to process and classify discontinued Vessel Monitoring Systems (VMS) data from longline fisheries. Main output: Determination of fishing operations' geographic boundaries and duration by vessel trip.
